title: AHS: 1984 Episode 7 Preview Breakdown! | "The Lady in White"
author: Think Story
comment: Who is the lady in white? Leave me your episode 7 predictions below!
Brooke new hairstyle is a character transformation of her going from a shy, terrified and sweet victim to a traumatized YET badass survivor who no longer wants to be a damsel in distress

That pranker in the clip wasn’t killed by Jingles, that’s the one that Xavier knocked into the punji pit because he thought it was Jingles. It’s actually odd to me that in that scene, Xavier says that Jingles killed half of them there, but literally no one pictured was killed by Jingles.
I’m so hyped on Dylan McDermott returning for this episode
Man Emma Roberts can’t catch a break in AHS 😂
description:
Time to breakdown and review American Horror Story's episode 7 preview "The Lady in White" where we look for clues, theories, and easter eggs for what the show has in store.
